Correlation table 
```{r}
library(dplyr)
keep = select(Shifting.all, -1)
a<-round(cor(keep, use = "complete.obs"), 2)

library(knitr)
kable(a, caption = "Correlation coefficients")
```

Correlation coefficients, Ns, p-values
```{r}
library("Hmisc")
rcorr(as.matrix(keep))
```

```{r}
library("corrplot")
Shifting.all<-Shifting.all[-1]
Shifting.all <- na.omit(Shifting.all)

matrix<-cor(Shifting.all)

p.mat <- cor.mtest(Shifting.all)$p

col <- colorRampPalette(c("#BB4444", "#EE9988", "#FFFFFF", "#77AADD", "#4477AA"))
corrplot(matrix, method = "color", col = col(200),
         type = "upper", order = "hclust", number.cex = .5,
         addCoef.col = "black", # Add coefficient of correlation
         tl.col = "black", tl.srt = 50, # Text label color and rotation
         # Combine with significance
         tl.cex = 0.8,
         cl.ratio = 1,
         p.mat = p.mat, sig.level = 0.05, insig = "blank", 
         # hide correlation coefficient on the principal diagonal
         diag = TRUE)


pairs(Shifting.all, pch = 19)
```
